title: Practical Instructional Design for Online Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Requires asynchronous/synchronous blended class design optimized for smartphone-based learning. Provides continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more online science education modules by applying the ADDIE model
Learners can develop two or more smartphone-friendly interaction strategies to enhance learner engagement
Learners can achieve over 80% learning outcomes using formative assessment tools
Learners can apply multimedia techniques for effective delivery of science concepts in online environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
